SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Animate
The Animate class handles the animation of game assets.
AnimationState
The AnimationState class manages the animation state of a Fighter.
Asset
Represents an asset in the game.
Asset.State
Enumeration of existing animations.
AssetsManager
The AssetsManager class handles the loading and management of game assets.
AssetsMetadata
Represents metadata for an asset.
Entity
The Entity class represents a generic entity with position and velocity.
Fighter
The Fighter class represents a player-controlled fighter in a game.
FighterSettings
Settings class for the fighter holding all fighter key binds
Floor
Represents the game Floor bounds and graphical rendering.
Game
The Game class extends JPanel and represents the actual game,
Health
The Health class represents the health rendering.
InputController
Represents an input controller for handling keyboard events.
Keys
The Keys enum represents the different keys used in the game.
Main
The Main class containing the entry point of the application.
MainFrame
The MainFrame class extends JFrame and serves as the main window for the game application.
Map
Represents the game map bounds.
Menu
Represents the game menu.
PlayerControlls
Represents player controls for movement and attacks.
Settings
Settings class initializing variables by reading a provided config file.
StartCounter
The StartCounter class implements a countdown timer that can be displayed graphically.
Timer
The Timer class is a simple utility class for tracking time intervals.
Winner
The Winner class extends JPanel and represents a simple panel that displays which player won the game and provides a button to proceed to the next game.
